akn:content.akn:p:
§ 44310. Ending effective date(a) In General.—The authority of the Secretary of Transportation to provide insurance and reinsurance under any provision of this chapter other than sections 44302a and 44305 is not effective after December 11, 2014.
(b) Insurance of United States Government Property.—The authority of the Secretary of Transportation to provide insurance and reinsurance for a department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States Government under section 44305 is not effective after September 30, 2028.
(Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1173; Pub. L. 105–85, div. A, title X, § 1088(a), Nov. 18, 1997, 111 Stat. 1921; Pub. L. 105–137, § 5(a), Dec. 2, 1997, 111 Stat. 2641; Pub. L. 113–235, div. L, § 102(c), Dec. 16, 2014, 128 Stat. 2767; Pub. L. 114–328, div. A, title X, § 1046, Dec. 23, 2016, 130 Stat. 2395; Pub. L. 116–92, div. A, title III, § 374, Dec. 20, 2019, 133 Stat. 1332; Pub. L. 117–328, div. Q, § 103(b)(2), Dec. 29, 2022, 136 Stat. 5252; Pub. L. 118–15, div. L. 118–63, title I, § 104(a), May 16, 2024, 138 Stat. 1034.)

(a) The authority of the Secretary of Transportation to provide insurance and reinsurance under any provision of this chapter other than sections 44302a and 44305 is not effective after December 11, 2014.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Insurance of United States Government Property.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) The authority of the Secretary of Transportation to provide insurance and reinsurance for a department, agency, or instrumentality of the United States Government under section 44305 is not effective after September 30, 2028.
